Battera::

She turned and looked at Chordate. 
"Like I said, I'm here for peace talks. Nothing more or less. Will 
you be willing to return to my base and talk with us?" She tried to 
smile but she was way to nervous.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, KSLawdogg@c... wrote:
> Chordate:
> 
> 
> Chordate lowered his weapon, bursting out in laughter.
> 
> He stopped chuckling.  "Sorry...I had to do that to keep my sanity 
together.  
> As far as I know, the leader of the Maximals ran off, the second in 
command 
> has been taken prisoner by...the Alliance, I think it was.  And the 
leader, 
> Kluster, of this ship, is who knows where.  So I am currently in 
command of 
> this vessel."
